products.name: Logomark Stickers (set of 3)
products.desc: Set of blue 2-inch (5 cm) circle stickers with the elementary ‘e’ logomark in white. Silkscreened on premium vinyl and layered with three coats of 100% UV protection meaning your stickers will stick for several years without fading.

products.name: Logotype Sticker
products.desc: elementary logotype in white on a transparent vinyl sticker; perfect for your laptop or car window. Measures approximately 8 × 2″ (20 × 5 cm). Silkscreened on premium vinyl and layered with three coats of 100% UV protection meaning your stickers will stick for several years without fading.
